abstract: The Pitchfork Music Festival expands to Paris on Oct. 28 and 29.
snippet: The Pitchfork Music Festival expands to Paris on Oct. 28 and 29.
lead_paragraph: Since 2006, Pitchfork Media has supplemented its tastemaking music Web site with an annual music festival in Chicago. On Oct. 28 and 29, the festival will cross the Atlantic for its first full-fledged event outside the United States, importing North American, British and Scandinavian bands for French audiences, at the Pitchfork Music Festival Paris. (Though most tickets for the festival itself are sold out, they are still available for the opening and closing party events; organizers say additional tickets will be available for the nighttime, or "club," sessions on the 28th.)

headline.main: Pitchfork Music Festival Comes to Paris
